description: Grants the user the power to grow spikes on any part of their body and turn any body part entirely into a spike, making them a Spike Human.

users.circumstances: Miss Doublefinger demonstrates her devil fruit abilities against Nami

abilityReveals.description: Creates spikes on both hands to perform piercing attacks.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Miss Doublefinger uses this technique against Nami during their battle.

abilityReveals.description: Transforms fingers into sharp spikes for precise piercing attacks.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to stab Nami's shoulder during the battle.

abilityReveals.description: Covers the entire body in spikes like a hedgehog for both offense and defense.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Demonstrated as a defensive and offensive technique during the fight.

abilityReveals.description: Uses spikes to pierce and sew opponents in place, immobilizing them.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Attempts to immobilize Nami during combat.

abilityReveals.description: Creates spikes on feet for enhanced mobility, allowing the user to climb walls and move faster.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used for rapid movement and positioning during the battle.

weaknesses.weakness: Spikes can be tangled or immobilized in cloth or fabric
Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Spikes are strong enough to pierce solid rock
strengths.description: The spikes are exceptionally sharp and durable, capable of penetrating hard materials.

strengths.strength: Can create spikes on any body part
strengths.description: Versatile ability to weaponize any part of the body.
Opponents risk injury when attempting to strike or grapple the user.
